mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( board_id, board_title, board_contents, reg_id, div ) VALUES ( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{regId}, #{div} )
INSERT INTO reply ( reply_id, board_id, reg_id, reply_content ) VALUES ( REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, NVL(#{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ''), #{replyContent, jdbcType=CLOB} )
mapper.select: SELECT board_id as boardId, board_title as title, board_contents as content, read_cnt as readCnt, reg_id as regId, reg_dt as regDt, mod_dt, div FROM board WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET read_cnt = read_cnt + 1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
UPDATE board SET board_title = #{title}, board_contents = #{content}, mod_dt = SYSDATE WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
